Unquenched Sword

one handed weapon (lvl 8 - unique)

item id [id]: 112
start battle spell [startbattlespell]: #925 Heat from Hell
berserk when wounded [berserk]: +1
weap id [weapon]: 84 (Unquenched Sword)
damage [dmg]: 22
attack [att]: +4
defence [def]: +1
length [len]: 1
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Slashing Damage [slash], Magic weapon [magic])

Extra effect on hit: Small Area Fire

weap id [weapon]: 171 (Small Area Fire)
damage [dmg]: 14
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
area of effect [aoe]: 1
 
(Heat/Fire [fire], Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 40F to forge (F5)

This blade is made of solid Fire tempered in an Elemental brazier. The flames that lick the ever-burning edge are incredibly hot and will cut through armor and flesh with equal ease. The heat of the blade will cause the temperature to rise on the entire battlefield and everyone to suffer from severe fatigue unless protected. This sword should wielded only by those protected from fire.
